description: This file declares the interface class IFactories within the WPEFramework::PluginHost namespace. It provides factory methods for creating web-related request and response objects, file bodies, and JSON RPC messages. Additionally, it includes deprecated type aliases for WorkerPool and Factories.

classes.name: IFactories
classes.description: An abstract interface class providing factory methods for creating various web-related objects, such as requests, responses, file bodies, and JSONRPC messages.

methods.name: Assign
methods.description: Assigns an instance of IFactories to a static pointer or singleton.

methods.name: Instance
methods.description: Returns a reference to the singleton instance of IFactories.

methods.name: IsAvailable
methods.description: Checks if the IFactories instance is available.

methods.name: Request
methods.description: Creates or retrieves a proxy to a Web::Request object.

methods.name: Response
methods.description: Creates or retrieves a proxy to a Web::Response object.

methods.name: FileBody
methods.description: Creates or retrieves a proxy to a Web::FileBody object.

methods.name: JSONRPC
methods.description: Creates or retrieves a proxy to a Web::JSONBodyType for Core::JSONRPC::Message.
